summary.span: 定义数据项和 控件中它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

span.span: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a control.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件绑定到数据源时，其中的每个数据项都包含多个字段 (例如具有多个属性的 XML 元素) 如果未定义菜单项绑定，则菜单项默认显示由数据项的方法返回的值 `ToString()` 。When the control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default. 对于 XML 元素，菜单项显示元素名称，该名称显示了菜单的基础结构，但在其他情况下不起作用。In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise. 您可以通过指定菜单项绑定将菜单项的属性绑定到特定的字段。You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings. 对象定义每个数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。A object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to. > [!NOTE] > 将 控件绑定到 控件时，菜单项绑定不起作用。When the control is bound to a control, menu item bindings have no effect. 使用站点地图提供程序自动执行绑定。Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider. 控件将其 对象存储在属性中 ，并将绑定应用于数据源，以便在菜单层次结构和数据源层次结构之间创建一对一关系。The control stores its objects in the property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy. 对于数据源中的每个数据项， 控件尝试将数据项与对象匹配， 以创建相应的 对象。For each data item in the data source, the control attempts to match the data item to a object to create the corresponding object. 创建对象时 ，必须指定绑定的条件。When creating a object, you must specify the criteria for binding. 条件指示数据项应绑定到菜单项的时间。The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item. 你可以指定 、 或。You can specify the , the , or both. 菜单项深度指定要绑定的菜单级别。A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound. 例如，下面的 声明分别将数据源的名称和 ID 字段绑定到 深度为0的所有节点的和属性：For example, the following declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the and properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` ``` 数据成员指定基础数据源中数据项的类型，但可以根据数据源表示不同的信息。A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source. 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由 对象表示) 公开一个 属性，该属性指定数据项的类型。Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an object) exposes a property, which specifies the type of the data item. 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element. 当数据源包含多个数据项类型时，数据成员将指定要使用的数据项类型。When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use. 以下 声明将控件的 `` 元素绑定 到菜单中的所有菜单项，而不考虑层次结构中的位置：The following declaration binds the `` elements of an control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` ``` 有时，您可能需要创建一个同时指定深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member. 当数据源包含具有相同数据成员值的不同级别的项时，通常使用此选项。This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value. 例如，您可以让 `` 元素显示在 XML 文件中的不同级别。For example, you can have `` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file. 以下 声明显示了如何指定在不同菜单深度应用于相同数据成员的菜单项绑定：The following declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `` `` 如果在没有深度和数据成员的情况下定义了菜单项绑定，则菜单项绑定将应用于菜单中的所有菜单项。If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu. 当所有数据项都具有相同的属性并且应以相同的方式显示时，无论菜单深度如何，这通常使用此选项。This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth. 建立绑定条件后，可以绑定 可以绑定到值的对象的属性。After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a object that can be bound to a value. 您可以绑定到数据项或静态值的字段。You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value. 当绑定到静态值时， 该对象应用到的所有对象都 将具有相同的值。When bound to a static value, all objects to which the object is applied share the same value. 绑定到字段的属性包含来自数据源的相应字段的值。Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 通过直接设置相应的属性，可以有选择地重写对象中的绑定属性。You can selectively override a bound property in a object by setting the corresponding property directly. 下表列出了类的属性 ，这些属性允许您将对象的属性绑定 到数据项的字段。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a field of a data item. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要绑定到对象的属性的字段 。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的字段 。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的字段 。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的字段 。The field to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的字段 。The field to bind to the property of a object.| 下表列出了类的属性 ，这些属性允许您将对象的属性绑定 到静态值。The following table lists the properties of the class that allow you to bind a property of the object to a static value. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| ||要绑定到对象的属性的静态值 。The static value to bind to the property of a object.| 如果 定义了冲突的对象， 控件将按以下优先级顺序应用菜单项绑定：If conflicting objects are defined, the control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1. 定义和匹配深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member. 2. 仅定义和匹配数据成员的对象。The object that defines and matches the data member only. 3. 仅定义和匹配深度的对象。The object that defines and matches the depth only. 4. 同时 定义深度和数据成员的对象。The object that defines neither the depth nor the data member. (此类型的菜单项绑定应用于菜单中的所有菜单项。 ) (This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5. 数据源中没有匹配项的对象。The object that does not have a match in the data source. 在这种情况下，数据项的方法返回的值 `ToString()` 随后将绑定到 应用对象的菜单项的和属性 。In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the and properties of the menu items to which the object is applied. 类还允许通过设置属性来设置菜单项中显示的文本的格式 。The class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象来定义控件的字段 与控件中的菜单项之间的关系 。The following code example demonstrates how to use objects to define the relationship between the fields of an control and the menu items in a control. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用应用 对象的菜单项，以允许此菜单项显示一个弹出图像和任何子菜单项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu item to which the object is applied is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.

value.span: 如果启用应用 的菜单项，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the menu item to which the is applied is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性设置 对象的属性 。Use the property to set the property of a object. 此设置与应用对象的所有菜单项共享 。This setting is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当此属性设置为时 `false` ，将禁用菜单项，并且不会显示指示子项的弹出图像。When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed. 将菜单项的此属性设置为， `false` 实际上会使菜单项成为该节点的末尾，而不会在该节点上显示更多级别。Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，用于指定应用 对象的菜单项的文本显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 格式字符串，用于指定应用 的菜单项的文本显示格式。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于提供菜单项文本的自定义格式。The property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text. 格式字符串可以包含文本字符串和/或占位符。The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both. 文本字符串按原义显示，而占位符替换为绑定到菜单项文本的值。The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text. 占位符分为两部分，由冒号分隔，格式为 { `A` ： `Bxx` }。The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}. 例如， {0:F2} 显示具有两个小数位的固定点数字。For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 占位符字符串必须括在大括号中，以指示它是占位符而不是文本字符串。The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本都显示为文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 如果保留为标准格式字符串语法，则在常规示例中，冒号 (前面的值 `A`) 指定从零开始的参数列表中的参数索引。Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. 由于每个菜单项中只能显示一个值，因此参数索引只能设置为0。Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0. 常规示例中冒号后面的字符 (`B`) 指定值的显示格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学 (指数) 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|以固定格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|以数字格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，但除外 `X` ，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 常规示例中格式字符 (后面的值 `xx`) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来设置控件的菜单项中显示的文本的格式 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to format the text displayed in the menu items of a control. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the is applied.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到对象的属性的自定义图像的 URL 。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the property of a object. 此图像与 应用对象的所有对象共享 。This image is shared with all objects to which the object is applied. 图像显示在菜单项文本的旁边，可以采用任何文件格式 ( .jpg、.gif、.bmp 等) ，只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式即可。The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过直接设置菜单项的属性来覆盖单个菜单项的图像 。You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 你还可以使用 属性将 对象的属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用此属性在每个菜单项中显示相同的图像 。Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the property to bind the property of a object to a field of a data source. 呈现时， 应用对象的每个菜单项的属性 包含字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果 同时设置了和属性，则 属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定显示在菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to an image to display next to the text of the menu items. 此图像显示在应用对象的每个菜单项中 。This image is displayed in each menu item to which the object is applied. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，在此目标窗口或框架中显示与应用 对象的菜单项关联的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定窗口或框架，在单击菜单项时，将在其中显示链接到菜单项的 Web 内容。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将覆盖 应用对象的菜单项的控件的属性 。Setting this property overrides the property of the control for the menu items to which the object is applied. 可以通过 直接设置每个菜单项的属性，来有选择地重写此属性。You can selectively override this property by setting the property of each menu item directly. 目标值必须以 A 到 Z (不区分大小写的) 范围内的字母开头，但某些以下划线开头的特殊值除外，如下表所示。Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为 `target` 属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` `anchor` XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果对象的呈现输出 必须符合 XHTML 1.1，请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). > > 创建可访问的网页时，强烈建议你避免使用 属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在单击菜单项时要在其中显示与菜单项关联的 Web 内容的窗口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window in which to display the Web content associated with a menu item, when that menu item is clicked. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

[!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/CS/menuitembindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBinding/VB/menuitembindingvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

summary.span: 获取或设置应用 对象的菜单项的 ToolTip 文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for a menu item to which the object is applied.

value.span: 应用 的菜单项的 ToolTip 文本。

span.span: The ToolTip text for a menu item to which the is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到对象的属性的文本 。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the text to bind to the property of a object. 此工具提示与应用对象的所有菜单项共享 。This ToolTip is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 当用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项上时，将显示指定的文本。When the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, the specified text is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过直接设置菜单项的属性来覆盖单个菜单项的工具提示 。You can override the ToolTip for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 您还可以 通过设置属性将对象的属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用此属性为每个菜单项指定相同的工具提示 。Instead of using this property to specify the same ToolTip for each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时， 应用对象的每个菜单项的属性 包含字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果 同时设置了和属性，则 属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定在用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项上时要显示的工具提示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the ToolTip to display when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item. 将为应用对象的每个菜单项显示此工具提示 。This ToolTip is displayed for each menu item to which the object is applied. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/CS/menuitembindingtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemBindingText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemBindingText/VB/menuitembindingtextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例站点地图数据。The following code is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 属性指定要绑定到对象的属性的值 。When the control is bound to a data source, use the property to specify the value to bind to the property of a object. 此值与应用对象的所有菜单项共享 。This value is shared with all menu items to which the object is applied. 指定的值不显示在菜单项中，用于存储有关应用对象的菜单项的任何其他数据 ，如用于处理回发事件的数据。The specified value is not displayed in a menu item and is used to store any additional data about a menu item to which the object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 您可以通过直接设置菜单项的属性来覆盖单个菜单项的值 。You can override the value for an individual menu item by setting its property directly. 您还可以 通过设置属性将对象的属性绑定到数据源的字段，而不是使用此属性为每个菜单项指定相同的值 。Instead of using this property to specify the same value for each menu item, you can also bind the property of a object to a field of a data source by setting the property. 呈现时， 应用对象的每个菜单项的属性 包含字段中的相应值。When rendered, the property of each menu item to which the object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field. > [!NOTE] > 如果 同时设置了和属性，则 属性优先。If the and properties are both set, the property takes precedence. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定与菜单项关联的 nondisplayed 值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a nondisplayed value associated with a menu item. 此值用于应用对象的每个菜单项 。This value is used in each menu item to which the object is applied. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Menu.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml.
